exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="563" height="823" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="game_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Image source="game_title_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Button label="" horizontalCenter="-185" top="14">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="pause0_png"
			         source.down="pause1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button label="" horizontalCenter="181" top="14">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="shuffle0_png"
			         source.down="shuffle1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" text="0" x="137" y="38" fontFamily="'Microsoft Yahei' Tahoma" width="99"/>
	<e:Group id="gameGroup" height="500" width="518" horizontalCenter="0" top="162" touchEnabled="false">
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameWinSkin" width="563" height="400" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="pop0_png" x="51" y="13"/>
	<e:Image source="pop1_png" x="109" y="13" width="347"/>
	<e:Image source="pop2_png" x="456" y="13"/>
	<e:Image source="pop3_png" x="51" y="73" height="267"/>
	<e:Image source="pop4_png" x="111" y="74" width="345" height="268"/>
	<e:Image source="pop5_png" x="456" y="73" height="267"/>
	<e:Image source="pop6_png" x="51" y="340"/>
	<e:Image source="pop7_png" x="80" y="340" width="404"/>
	<e:Image source="pop8_png" x="456" y="340"/>
	<e:Image source="cat_win_png" x="105" y="46"/>
	<e:Button id="retryBtn" x="109" y="271">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="retry0_png"
			         source.down="retry1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="nextBtn" label="" x="290" y="271">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="next0_png"
			         source.down="next1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" text="分数：1111" x="101" y="181" width="353" verticalAlign="middle" size="40" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'" textAlign="center" height="64"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="563" height="823" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="home_bg_jpg" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="log_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="65"/>
	<e:Button id="startBtn" label="开始" horizontalCenter="0" top="476">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="start0_png"
			         source.down="start1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
			         size="40" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
			         textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="optionBtn" label="" horizontalCenter="-113.5" top="620">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="option0_png"
			         source.down="option1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="rankBtn" label="" horizontalCenter="0" top="621">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="rank0_png"
			         source.down="rank1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="cupBtn" label="" horizontalCenter="115.5" top="621">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="cup0_png"
			         source.down="cup1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LevelBtnUISkin" width="250" height="140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Skin states="up,down">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="levelbg0_png" source.down="levelbg1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="levelNumLabel" text="-1-" y="20" fontFamily="'Microsoft Yahei' Tahoma" width="106" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="titleLabel" y="57" text="新手" fontFamily="'Microsoft Yahei' Tahoma" textAlign="center" width="106" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="fishLabel" horizontalCenter="-25" y="98" text="1999" fontFamily="'Microsoft Yahei' Tahoma" textAlign="left" width="90" verticalAlign="justify" x="10" size="20" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="starLabel" horizontalCenter="52" y="98" text="1999" fontFamily="'Microsoft Yahei' Tahoma" textAlign="right" width="34" size="20" verticalAlign="justify" x="20" height="20" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image source="fish_small_png" x="23" y="92" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image source="star_small_png" x="197" y="90" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SelectLevelSkin" width="563" height="823" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="home_bg_jpg" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	
	<e:Button id="backBtn" label="" bottom="16" horizontalCenter="-223.5">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="back0_png"
			         source.down="back1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSkin" width="563" height="823" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="loading_png" top="142" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="loadLabel" textColor="0x0B0000" width="155" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" bottom="215" fontFamily="Arial" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RankUISkin" width="563" height="400" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="start0_png" y="4" width="479" height="356" horizontalCenter="1"/>
	<e:Button id="quitBtn" label="" horizontalCenter="-0.5" y="235">
		<e:Skin states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"
			         source="back0_png"
			         source.down="back1_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label text="1" x="127" y="76" width="33" height="32"/>
	<e:Label id="name0Label" width="103" y="76" height="32" text="1" x="177"/>
	<e:Label id="name1Label" width="103" y="117" height="32" text="1" x="177"/>
	<e:Label id="name2Label" width="103" y="154" height="32" text="1" x="177"/>
	<e:Label id="score0Label" width="103" y="76" height="32" text="1" x="320"/>
	<e:Label id="score1Label" width="103" y="114" height="32" text="1" x="320"/>
	<e:Label id="score2Label" width="103" y="154" height="32" text="1" x="320"/>
	<e:Label width="33" y="116" height="32" text="2" x="127"/>
	<e:Label width="33" y="155" height="32" text="3" x="127"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TitleUISkin" width="563" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="title_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Image source="title_fish_png" horizontalCenter="-197.5" top="14"/>
	<e:Image source="title_star_png" horizontalCenter="199.5" top="8"/>
	<e:Label id="fishLabel" text="1999" y="21" width="125" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'" horizontalCenter="-107"/>
	<e:Label id="starlabel" width="129" y="20" text="1999" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'ial" textAlign="right" horizontalCenter="105"/>
	<e:Label id="titleLabel" text="选择一个主题" y="63" width="293" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="'Microsoft Yahei' Tahoma" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	
</e:Skin>
